name: Yume Miru Kusuri: A Drug That Makes You Dream
name_original: Yume Miru Kusuri: A Drug That Makes You Dream
description:
Yume Miru Kusuri: A Drug That Makes You Dream is an adventure game developed by Ruf. It came out on 22-12-2005. It was published by Peach Princess. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Yume Miru Kusuri: A Drug That Makes You Dream is available on PC.
